translation.en: [man] Hey! Where's the drums?
Shark!
Shark!
Shark!
Help!
Help!
Gina! Lizzie! See if you can scare them off. Go!
translation.de: Gina! Lizzie! Versucht, sie zu verjagen. Los!

translation.en: Tyler. Eric. Get him out of there.
translation.de: Tyler. Eric. Holt ihn da raus.

translation.en: Come on, man.
You're safe now.
Who are you guys?
Oh, us?
We're Malibu Junior Rescue.
Do you have to say the "Junior" part? It makes us sound like weenies.
translation.de: Musste das "Junior" sein? Das klingt nach Weicheiern.

translation.en: Lizzie says I make it sound cool. Dude, she's your girlfriend.
translation.de: -Lizzie findet, bei mir klingt es cool. -Sie ist deine Freundin.

translation.en: Lizzie thinks everything you do is cool.
translation.de: Lizzie findet alles an dir cool.

translation.en: She's pretty great, isn't she?
Hang on to your butts!
Come back!
Dylan, Tyler fell overboard!
[Tyler] Hey!
Are you okay?
I am now. You saved me, Dylan.
translation.de: Jetzt schon. Du hast mich gerettet, Dylan.

translation.en: You're amazing.
[high-pitched voice] What was that?
Mom, I just had the weirdest dream.
translation.de: Mom, ich hatte einen komischen Traum.

translation.en: [mother's voice] What was it, sweetheart?
Dylan, you okay?
Yeah, I'm fine. I thought I saw a thing. [chuckles]
translation.de: Ja, mir geht's gut. Ich dachte, ich hätte etwas gesehen.

translation.en: I didn't.
So, first day back at Junior Rescue. You excited?
translation.de: Erster Tag zurück bei den Rettungsschwimmern. Aufgeregt?

translation.en: So excited!
I can't wait to see everybody. Gina, Lizzie, Eric.
translation.de: Ich freue mich auf alle. Gina, Lizzie, Eric.

translation.en: And Tyler?
-I said Tyler. -No, you didn't.
Oh, yeah. Well, sure. Him too.
translation.de: Oh, ja. Na klar. Auf ihn auch.

translation.en: -Not, like, more than everybody else. -[mouths]
translation.de: Nicht mehr als auf die anderen.

translation.en: You know, the same as everybody else. Like equal to.
translation.de: Genauso wie auf die anderen. Gleichwertig.

translation.en: -Mom, we're just friends. -Okay.
Uh! I can't with you right now.
The International Junior Rescue Championship is this week.
I have to get to the beach to help set up! [sniffs]
translation.de: Ich helfe am Strand beim Aufbau!

translation.en: I don't have Tyler for this!
I heard it.
Roger wants everybody there early. He sent, like, 40 e-mails reminding us. [laughs]
translation.de: Roger will, dass alle früh da sind. Er hat fast 40 E-Mails geschickt.

translation.en: As if anybody could forget.
I forgot!
I'm sorry!
How could you forget? I sent, like, 40 e-mails!
Nobody my age checks e-mail!
translation.de: Keiner in meinem Alter checkt E-Mails.

translation.en: Look, Junior Rescue doesn't even officially start until next week.
translation.de: Die Junior-Rettungsschwimmer fangen nächste Woche an.

translation.en: Why are we leaving so early?
Hello?
The teams are arriving.
For the Beachmaster?
The international competition we're hosting?
translation.de: Der internationale Wettbewerb, den wir ausrichten?

translation.en: Oh, yeah, right. That's today. I remember seeing that somewhere.
translation.de: Ja. Das ist heute. Irgendwo sah ich das.

translation.en: It was in the e-mail!
[sighs] Look, I'm not even competing in the thing. Why do I have to be there?
translation.de: Ich trete im Wettbewerb nicht an. Was soll ich da also?

translation.en: Just get in.
What's going on?
Dad, you told him to be at the car by 7:00, or you'd leave without him.
translation.de: Dad, er sollte um 7 Uhr am Auto sein, sonst fährst du ohne ihn.

translation.en: How can you expect anyone to respect your authority if your own stepson walks all over you?
translation.de: Wie soll man deine Autorität respektieren, wenn dein Stiefsohn sich widersetzt?

translation.en: You're right. This is my first year in charge of Junior Rescue.
translation.de: Du hast recht. Ich leite erstmals die Junior-Rettungsschwimmer.

translation.en: I can't have anyone questioning my leadership. Sorry, Tyler.
translation.de: Keiner darf mich anzweifeln. Tut mir leid, Tyler.

translation.en: [Tyler] How am I supposed to get to Malibu?
translation.de: Wie soll ich nach Malibu kommen?

translation.en: Did somebody say Malibu?
Vooch? How did you know I was gonna need a ride?
translation.de: Vooch? Woher wusstest du, dass ich mitfahren muss?

translation.en: I'm a bus driver, man. It's what I do!
translation.de: Ich bin Busfahrer. Das ist mein Ding!

translation.en: Eric told me you'd probably oversleep.
So we told Vooch to come get you.
-Also that. -Is there anyone sweeter than Eric?
Wait, where is he?
Art is life!
Life is pain.
This is a doughnut.
Are we supposed to paint the doughnut?
No.
I eat the doughnut.
You make art. [chuckles]
Welcome to summer school.
I can do a pretty good Garfield.
translation.de: Ich kann Garfield ganz gut malen.

translation.en: Guess I'll just paint that.
The whole school year, I texted Eric during sixth period, which was my free period.
translation.de: Ich schrieb Eric immer in der 6. Stunde, meiner Freistunde.

translation.en: I thought it was his free period too, but it wasn't. That's when he had art.
translation.de: Ich dachte, es wäre auch seine, aber er hatte Kunst.

translation.en: So instead of leaving her on read, the dummy failed art.
translation.de: Statt sie zu ignorieren, fiel er durch Kunst durch.

translation.en: Now he has to retake it in summer school.
We gotta get him out of there.
What's our play? Gas the room? Tranq the teacher? Unleash an army of squirrels?
translation.de: Wie denn? Gas einleiten? Lehrerin betäuben? Eichhörnchen-Attacke?

translation.en: A little peanut butter and an acorn, those fuzzy-tailed rats will do anything you want.
translation.de: Erdnussbutter und Eicheln, und die machen alles.

translation.en: Or we just let Eric get an education.
Not on my watch. Tyler. Here's that Eric dummy I was telling you about.
translation.de: -Das lasse ich nicht zu. -Tyler. Die Eric-Puppe, die ich erwähnte.

translation.en: Why do you have an Eric dummy?
Oh, I have dummies of all you guys. It's how I take the carpool lane on the weekends.
translation.de: Ich habe Puppen von euch allen. So darf ich auf die Eltern-Fahrspur.

translation.en: Hey! I was carrying that.
Whoa, whoa! Whoa, whoa whoa! Let me get that from you.
-Hey, I was gonna put that up. -I know. And you were doing such a good job,
translation.de: -Die wollte ich aufstellen. -Ich weiß. Und du hast das toll gemacht.

translation.en: but why don't you let one of the big kids handle it, okay?
translation.de: Aber überlass das den älteren Kids, ok?

translation.en: So, where's Tyler? Who cares?
Definitely not me. I don't care.
translation.de: Mich nicht. Mir egal. Keine Ahnung, warum ich gefragt habe.

translation.en: Don't even know why I asked. [laughs]
translation.de: Mir egal. Keine Ahnung, warum ich gefragt habe.

translation.en: Oh, look! There's Dirk and Beans!
translation.de: Schau mal! Da sind Dirk und Beans!

translation.en: Get that grill fired up, boys. [chuckles]
Okay.
Oh, where are they?
Why is everybody so worried about where Tyler and his dumb friends are?
translation.de: Warum sind alle so besorgt, wo Tyler und seine blöden Freunde sind?

translation.en: What? No, not Tyler. I'm talking about Team USA.
translation.de: Was? Nein, nicht Tyler. Ich meine das Team USA.

translation.en: Tyler and his friends can't handle the Beachmaster. There's too much riding on it.
translation.de: Tyler und seine Freunde sind ungeeignet. Es hängt zu viel davon ab.

translation.en: International teams are gonna be here any minute.
We cannot be late to our own welcome barbecue.
translation.de: Wir dürfen nicht zu spät zur Begrüßung sein.

translation.en: Dad, is Junior Junior Rescue really a thing?
Or did you not want to pay for camp while Mom and Jake were out of town?
translation.de: Oder wolltest du keine Betreuung zahlen, weil Mom und Jake weg sind?

translation.en: 'Cause nobody's letting me do anything.
Well, I mean...
translation.de: Na ja, ich meine, das gibt es nicht.

translation.en: No, it's not. But when you think about it, it could be.
translation.de: Na ja, ich meine, das gibt es nicht. Aber es ist vorstellbar.

translation.en: Oh, finally. Ha ha ha! It's Team USA!
translation.de: Endlich. Da ist das Team USA!

translation.en: Dang! That Jeep is on-brand.
translation.de: Verflixt! Der Jeep passt ja super.

translation.en: [through bullhorn] What's up?
Hey, Grandma, move it! That spot is for Team USA!
translation.de: Hey, Oma, Bewegung! Der Platz ist für Team USA reserviert!

translation.en: Spence, would you honk at her?
Don't honk at her.
Spence, so help me, if you don't get honking!
translation.de: Spence, wenn du nicht sofort hupst...

translation.en: Don't do it.
Yo, are we jerks, or are we good guys?
translation.de: Yo, sind wir Idioten, oder sind wir die Guten?

translation.en: 'Cause I'm getting really mixed signals here.
Those guys have won the Beachmaster four years in a row. No one's ever won it five.
translation.de: Sie gewannen den Beachmaster viermal. Keiner schaffte je fünf.

translation.en: And when we do, [laughs] we can kiss all our troubles goodbye!
translation.de: Wenn wir es tun, sind wir alle Sorgen los!

translation.en: -What troubles? -What troubles? Who said troubles?
translation.de: Welche Sorgen? Sorgen? Du hast davon angefangen.

translation.en: I didn't say troubles. You did. Look, all I'm trying to say is,
translation.de: Sorgen? Du hast davon angefangen. Ich will nur sagen,

translation.en: with Brody, Spencer, Presley, Izzy, and the Chooch, we got this on lock.
translation.de: mit Brody, Spencer, Presley, Izzy und Chooch klappt es ganz sicher.

translation.en: Didn't the Chooch graduate high school, like, three years ago?
translation.de: Hat Chooch nicht vor drei Jahren die Schule abgeschlossen?

translation.en: Four, actually.
You are the vessels. Let your muse guide your hands.
translation.de: Ihr seid die Gefäße. Lasst die Muse eure Hände leiten.

translation.en: [gasps] Oh, Eric.
Yes, that's it. Release your art.
translation.de: Ja, das ist es. Lass deine Kunst raus.

translation.en: Release it. Everyone release.
translation.de: Lass sie raus. Lasst sie alle raus.

translation.en: I don't think you're releasing. Let the paint flow. [laughs]
translation.de: Ihr lasst sie nicht raus. Lasst die Farbe fließen.

translation.en: [Eric] I totally thought I was gonna miss seeing the Beachmaster.
translation.de: Ich dachte echt, ich verpasse den Beachmaster.

translation.en: Thanks for busting me out of summer school, you guys.
translation.de: Danke, dass ihr mich rausgeholt hab.

translation.en: It's so great to see you!
translation.de: Es ist so toll, euch zu sehen!

translation.en: Did you get a haircut?
-It looks amazing. -[chuckles]
-Well-- -[Tyler] Really?
I just went in for a trim, and I was afraid my guy took too much off,
translation.de: Ich fürchtete, der Typ hat zu viel abgeschnitten,

translation.en: but you saying that really makes me feel--
translation.de: aber wenn du das sagst, fühle ich mich viel...

translation.en: Um, I think he was talking to me. [chuckles]
translation.de: aber wenn du das sagst, fühle ich mich viel... Er meinte mich.

translation.en: But your hair looks great, too.
Thanks, man!
One year later, and you two are exactly the same dorks you were
translation.de: Ein Jahr später, und ihr seid immer noch so doof wie damals.

translation.en: when you left each other.
translation.de: und ihr seid immer noch so doof wie damals.

translation.en: [Eric and Tyler] Yeah, we are!
-[sloshes] -[Dylan gags] Oh!
This coleslaw expired the year I was born! We cannot serve this.
translation.de: Das ist in meinem Geburtsjahr abgelaufen! Das können wir nicht anbieten.

translation.en: [man] Babe, you can't just go for a swim.
-[bus horn plays "Pop! Goes the Weasel"] -[gasps] They're here!
You guys!
-Hi. -[Lizzie] Hey, Dylan.
Come here.
Okay, I'm calling it. This hug's done.
[Vooch] There she is.
There was definitely something between us last year.
translation.de: Letztes Jahr war definitiv etwas zwischen uns.

translation.en: But what if it's gone?
What if I'm too late?
translation.de: Wenn ich zu spät dran bin?

translation.en: Vooch, do you mind?
Just saying what everybody's thinking, man.
translation.de: Ich sage nur, was alle denken.

translation.en: [laughing] Okay, bye.
[Lizzie] Hey! How are you?
-[horn honking] -Look alive, people!
It's showtime.
[Roger laughing] Yeah! Yes!
Hello!
Hola.
Bonjour.
Konnichiwa.
Shalom.
[Australian accent] G'day, mates.
Am I saying that right? "Mates"?
-Uh... -[Roger chuckles] Okay.
Those are the best Junior Rescuers in the world? They don't seem so great.
translation.de: Das sind die besten Rettungsschwimmer der Welt? Schwach.

translation.en: [Roger] Hey, superhero.
That was pretty great.
Pssh, whatever. I do stuff like that all the time.
translation.de: Egal. So was mache ich ständig.

translation.en: [Dylan] That's Team Australia.
They're, like, Team USA's biggest rival.
This is so exciting. We can learn from them, train with them...
translation.de: Aufregend. Wir können von ihnen lernen, zusammen trainieren...

translation.en: -[sizzling] -...and apparently, make lunch for them.
This is humiliating.
[Tyler] I know, right?
-[sizzling] -I got a man down here!
Pulling a burger out of the coals isn't the kind of rescuing
translation.de: Einen Burger rausholen ist nicht die Rettung,

translation.en: I thought we'd be doing this summer.
-[applause, PA feedback] -Thank you. Thank you.
Welcome to the 2020 International Beachmaster competition!
You are the most elite Junior Rescue teams in the world,
translation.de: Ihr seid die besten Junior-Rettungsschwimmer der Welt,

translation.en: and we are thrilled to have you here in beautiful Malibu!
translation.de: und wir freuen uns, euch hier in Malibu zu begrüßen!

translation.en: Please, please.
Our sand is your sand.
Our seas are your seas.
Train, enjoy, and this Friday, may the best team win!
translation.de: Trainiert, habt Spaß, und möge am Freitag das beste Team gewinnen!

translation.en: -[all cheering] -He's talking about us!
-Let's go! [grunts] -Whoo! Yeah!
I can't believe we have to serve food
while Brody gets to strut around like big, dumb...
translation.de: während Brody herumstolziert wie ein dummer...

translation.en: Brody.
I don't know why those guys get to be Team USA. We saved the beach last year.
translation.de: Warum sind die im Team USA? Wir retteten den Strand letztes Jahr.

translation.en: Just 'cause they're from Malibu, they're automatically better than us?
translation.de: Sie sind aus Malibu und damit automatisch besser?

translation.en: We could've been Team USA. Why didn't Roger give us a chance to try out?
translation.de: Wir könnten Team USA sein. Warum gab Roger uns keine Chance?

translation.en: What's that, Valley?
You think you can be Team USA, huh?
I got two words for that.
Chyeah. You wish.
We're the Dream Team, man. We've won this thing four years in a row.
translation.de: Wir sind das Dream-Team. Wir sind vierfache Sieger.

translation.en: One more and we will have the longest winning streak in Beachmaster history.
translation.de: Noch ein Sieg, und es ist die längste Gewinnserie der Beachmaster-Geschichte.

translation.en: The longest streak you've ever had was in your shorts.
translation.de: So lang wie der Streifen in deiner Shorts.

translation.en: [laughs] Spence?
Hey-- Hey, Spence! Guess what I said about Tyler's shorts.
translation.de: Hey, Spence! Rate mal, was ich über Tylers Shorts sagte.

translation.en: [laughs] You're gonna love it.
Well, that guy's a real drongo, mate.
Yeah, he is.
Unless that means "cool guy," in which case, he is not.
translation.de: Es sei denn, Honks sind cool.

translation.en: Yeah. No, it's, uh, Aussie for "idiot."
translation.de: Ja. Nein, so nennen wir Australier Idioten.

translation.en: Well, then, yes, he is a major drongo.
Hey, I'm Tyler.
Wayno. Cheers for the burger, brother. Catch you around, yeah?
translation.de: Wayno. Danke für den Burger, Bruder. Wir sehen uns.

translation.en: Well, he seemed nice.
[Brody] Hey, Valley!
Don't forget to toast my buns!
translation.de: Ihr kriegt ja ganz heiße Backen!

translation.en: I said toast my buns!
[groans] I'm out of slaw here.
Fret not. Eric to the rescue!
translation.de: Keine Sorge. Eric eilt zur Rettung!

translation.en: I can get it.
No, Eric. Not that one.
That one's rotten. I'll get a new one.
translation.de: Der ist vergammelt. Ich hole neuen.

translation.en: [Brody] USA! USA! USA!
Is hungry!
[laughing] In his shorts!
Here you go, Brody. Gave you a little extra coleslaw.
Ssh! Don't tell anybody.
Oh, my God.
This slaw...
...is amazing!
-Spencer, try this! -Wait. No, no. Wait, wait.
translation.de: ...ist super! Spencer, probier mal! Nein, warte.

translation.en: [Brody] Eat up.
-Yo, this slaw is legit! -Yeah.
It's like it's creamy, but it burns.
No, Presley!
Weird. It's like I hate it, but I also can't stop eating it!
translation.de: Seltsam. Ich hasse ihn irgendwie, aber kann nicht aufhören, ihn zu essen!

translation.en: [Tyler] Uh, guys-- Uh, guys, seriously!
-[Brody] Wait, wait! -[Tyler] Come on!
It makes my teeth sting.
[Brody] Hey. Easy, buddy.
-What do you think you're doing? -I think I overcooked this burger.
translation.de: Was soll das? Der Burger ist verbrannt. Ich hole einen neuen.

translation.en: -Here, let me get you a new one. -Hey! Bring back more of that funky slaw.
translation.de: Der Burger ist verbrannt. Ich hole einen neuen. Bring mehr leckeren Krautsalat mit. Chooch aß meinen.

translation.en: The Chooch just finished mine.
translation.de: Bring mehr leckeren Krautsalat mit. Chooch aß meinen.

translation.en: [grunts] Good thing we got a new one.
Could you imagine if somebody actually ate that stuff?
translation.de: Stell dir vor, irgendwer würde das Zeug essen!

translation.en: Oh, no!
[crying] I'm sorry!
Oh, man, this is not good.
translation.de: Oh Mann, das ist nicht gut.

translation.en: Wait, wait, wait. Don't take me away. Don't take me away. I'm feeling a little bit better. [farts]
translation.de: Warten Sie. Bringen Sie mich nicht weg! Mir geht es etwas besser.

translation.en: [grunts] Oh, take me away! Take me away!
-This is a nightmare. -[siren chirping]
[Tyler] Roger, it-- It's gonna be okay.
Look, I'm sure they'll be feeling better by tomorrow.
translation.de: Morgen geht es ihnen sicher besser.

translation.en: The paramedic says it's the worst case of food poisoning she's ever seen.
translation.de: Die Sanitäterin sah nie so eine üble Lebensmittelvergiftung.

translation.en: They want us to seal those port-a-potties in cement and bury them in the desert.
translation.de: Wir sollen die Toiletten in der Wüste vergraben.

translation.en: Okay, Lizzie, we get it! They're sick. Do we have to keep talking about it?
translation.de: Ok! Sie sind krank. Müssen wir darüber reden?

translation.en: It's just a lot of potty talk,
and I think that we're better than that, that's all.
translation.de: und ich finde, wir sind besser.

translation.en: Well, that's that.
What's what?
No Team USA means no win.
No win means no streak. And no streak means no world record.
translation.de: Ohne Sieg keine Gewinnserie. Ohne Gewinnserie kein Weltrekord.

translation.en: I think we all know what that means.
Uh, no, we don't.
Look, I didn't wanna have to tell you guys this, but...
translation.de: Ich wollte es euch nicht sagen, aber...

translation.en: we don't have enough kids signed up for Junior Rescue next week.
translation.de: ...es gibt zu wenig Anmeldungen für die Juniors.

translation.en: -What? -Yeah.
Parents weren't lining up to send their kids to the beach
after that tower blew up last year.
But, like, no towers have blown up since then.
translation.de: Aber seitdem sind keine Türme hochgegangen.

translation.en: Yeah, they don't exactly reward you for towers that don't blow up.
translation.de: Sie belohnen dich nicht für stehende Türme.

translation.en: They just penalize you for the ones that do.
If we won for a fifth time,
we would officially be the greatest Junior Rescue team in the world!
translation.de: wären wir offiziell das beste Junior-Rettungsschwimmerteam der Welt!

translation.en: We'd have the trophies to prove it! Nobody would care about what happened last summer.
translation.de: Wir hätten Pokale als Beweis! Der letzte Sommer wäre dann allen egal.

translation.en: Ah! A record-breaking win by Team USA was exactly the thing we needed
translation.de: Einen Rekordsieg von Team USA hätten wir gebraucht,

translation.en: to inspire a new generation of Junior Rescuers to sign up.
Well, how many kids do we have?
Three.
Three? That's it?
Quit rubbing it in!
I can tell a bunch of my friends to sign up. I wield a lot of power in my friend group.
translation.de: Ich kann Freunde holen. Ich habe Macht unter meinen Freunden.

translation.en: Sasha, ten more little kids isn't gonna solve this problem.
translation.de: Sasha, zehn Kids mehr sind nicht die Lösung.

translation.en: Why don't you just let us worry about that?
Without Team USA's big win, I don't see how we're gonna get more recruits.
translation.de: Ohne den großen Sieg finden wir keine neuen Rekruten.

translation.en: No more recruits means no more Junior Rescue.
I'm sorry, guys, but after Friday, we'll have no choice but to shut the program down.
translation.de: Tut mir leid, aber nach Freitag müssen wir das Programm einstellen.

translation.en: What are you looking at?
-Jeffy! Did you find my great big hat? -[music stops]
translation.de: Jeffy! Hast du meinen großen Hut gefunden?

translation.en: Oh! You found it.
Who is my best little boy? You are. You're my best little boy. Come here.
translation.de: Wer ist mein bester kleiner Junge? Du bist mein bester kleiner Junge. Komm.

translation.en: Oh, my gosh! Oh! Oh!
We can't just let this happen. What are we supposed to do?
translation.de: -Das dürfen wir nicht zulassen. -Was sollen wir tun?

translation.en: We'll be Team USA.
We can't just be Team USA. We're not ready.
translation.de: Wir können nicht einfach Team USA sein. Wir sind nicht bereit.

translation.en: Tyler, are you serious?
Yes.
Look, we can't let Junior Rescue go without a fight.
translation.de: Die Junior-Rettungsschwimmer geben nicht kampflos auf.

translation.en: We're as good as Brody and those other guys. Besides, how hard could it be?
translation.de: Wir sind so gut wie Brody und der Rest. Außerdem, wie schwer kann das sein?

translation.en: Yeah!
That's the Beachmaster?
It is called the Beachmaster. Did you think it was gonna be easy?
translation.de: Es heißt Beachmaster. Dachtest du, es wird leicht?

translation.en: I was hoping!
Kind of wishin' I was in summer school right now.
translation.de: Ich wünschte, ich wäre in der Sommerschule.

translation.en: Guys, this isn't The Crucible. The Beachmaster pushes you to your limits.
translation.de: Es ist kein Crucible-Hindernislauf, sondern geht an unsere Grenzen.

translation.en: Limits you didn't even know you had.
translation.de: Grenzen, die man gar nicht kannte.

translation.en: Okay, Brody and his team have been training all year,
translation.de: Brodys Team trainierte das ganze Jahr. Wir haben bis Freitag.

translation.en: and we have until Friday. That's, like, four days!
translation.de: Brodys Team trainierte das ganze Jahr. Wir haben bis Freitag. Das sind vier Tage!

translation.en: Yeah!
If we don't do anything, Junior Rescue dies. We have to try.
translation.de: Es geht um die Junior-Retter. Wir müssen es tun.

translation.en: Look, Dylan, you're with me, right?
[laughs] With you? Like, um-- Like with you, with you?
translation.de: Bei dir? So richtig bei dir?

translation.en: Yeah. Wait, no. Uh, wait. What did you mean?
translation.de: Ja. Moment, nein. Moment. Was meinst du?

translation.en: What did you mean?
-Nothing, forget it! -Nothing, forget it!
I can get us ready in four days. My dad's a retired drill sergeant.
translation.de: Ich mache uns in vier Tagen startklar. Dad war früher Armeeausbilder.

translation.en: My entire life has been one big boot camp.
translation.de: Mein Leben ist ein einziges großes Bootcamp.

translation.en: I can kill 30 different ways with my thumb.
Ooh! I wanna learn that.
We just need somebody to train us for the Beachmaster.
I can do that. We're Tower Two.
translation.de: Das kann ich. Wir sind Turm Zwei.

translation.en: We saved Junior Rescue last summer, and we can do it again this year.
translation.de: Wir retteten die Junior-Rettungsschwimmer und können das wieder.

translation.en: I can have us ready to win by Friday.
translation.de: Bis Freitag mache ich uns bereit.

translation.en: All right, Gina, we're all yours.
Just tell us what to do.
translation.de: Sag uns, was wir tun sollen.

translation.en: [whistles] All right, you maggots, your butts belong to me!
translation.de: Ihr Maden, euer Hintern gehört mir!

translation.en: From here on out, you talk when I say you talk and rest when I say you rest!
translation.de: Ihr redet nur, wenn ich es erlaube, und ruht aus, wenn ich's sage!

translation.en: Get a good night's sleep 'cause hell begins tomorrow.
translation.de: Schlaft gut. Morgen geht die Hölle los.

translation.en: Wow, that whistle really went to her head. [whistle blares]
translation.de: Wow, die Pfeife stieg ihr zu Kopf.

translation.en: Eric, what are you doing here so early?
translation.de: Eric, was machst du so früh hier?

translation.en: You're right. You know what? You're right. I shouldn't interrupt.
translation.de: Stimmt. Du hast recht. Ich sollte nicht stören.

translation.en: You know, I just have to say,
I find your dedication inspiring, you know?
Reminds me of my semester abroad in Paris.
translation.de: Erinnert mich an mein Auslandssemester in Paris.

translation.en: -[accordion music playing] -Oh, I learned so much that year.
translation.de: In dem Jahr habe ich so viel gelernt.

translation.en: About life, about laughter. [chuckles]
translation.de: Über das Leben, über das Lachen.

translation.en: About love.
Gina said to be here at 6:30. Where is she?
translation.de: Gina bestellte uns für 6:30 Uhr her. Wo ist sie?

translation.en: Maybe she overslept?
You wanna know why that just happened? Because you weren't ready!
translation.de: Warum passierte das gerade? Weil du nicht bereit warst!

translation.en: All the teams we're about to face this week have one thing in common.
translation.de: Alle gegnerischen Teams diese Woche haben eines gemeinsam.

translation.en: They were actually chosen to compete?
Well, yeah.
-They've been training for months? -Yeah, that too.
They're the pride of their countries, and we're a bunch of underdogs nobody believes in?
translation.de: Sie sind der Stolz ihrer Länder, und an uns glaubt keiner?

translation.en: I was gonna say they're ready for anything.
translation.de: Ich wollte sagen, sie sind für alles bereit.

translation.en: The Beachmaster is a grueling obstacle course
translation.de: Der Beachmaster ist ein krasser Hindernislauf,

translation.en: designed to put lifeguarding's most important skills to the test:
strength, endurance, agility, and, most importantly, teamwork.
translation.de: Kraft, Ausdauer, Beweglichkeit und vor allem Teamwork.

translation.en: The team that gets through the course the fastest, wins. The whole team.
translation.de: Das Team, das am schnellsten durchkommt, gewinnt. Das ganze Team.

translation.en: That means we have to work together.
No problem. We're Tower Two. Teamwork is our jam.
translation.de: Kein Thema. Wir sind Turm Zwei. Teamwork ist unser Ding.

translation.en: Good. Then this should be easy.
Now move your butts! We've got work to do!
translation.de: Bewegt eure Hintern! Wir haben Arbeit!

translation.en: -[whistle blares] -[Lizzie] Ooh! Oh, sorry!
-[Tyler] Let's go! -[Gina] Really?
[Dylan] Let's move away from here. Head that way. Okay.
translation.de: Gehen wir woanders hin. Da lang. Ok.

translation.en: Yeah, come on! Let's go, Dylan!
Whoo! Come on! You got this! Move those legs! Let's go! Yeah!
translation.de: Los! Ihr schafft das! Bewegt die Beine! Los! Ja!

translation.en: After you.
-Eric, what are you doing? -Holding the wire for my lady.
translation.de: -Was soll das? -Ich halte den Draht für meine Dame.

translation.en: Oh, I'm sorry. I didn't know you two were out on a date.
translation.de: Tut mir leid. Ich wusste nicht, dass ihr ein Date habt.

translation.en: I thought we were training for the most important competition of our lives!
translation.de: Ich dachte, wir trainieren für den allerwichtigsten Wettkampf!

translation.en: -Move it! Move it! -[whistle blares]
Let's go! Come on!
Keep it up! Let's go! Go! Whoo!
-[Tyler] Oh, come on, guys! -[Lizzie] I got it! I got it!
Come on, guys! Teamwork makes the dream work!
translation.de: Los! Teamwork macht den Traum wahr!

translation.en: Let's go, you maggots! Go! Go! Go!
Come on! Go, slowpoke!
Come on, Eric! Let's go! Let's go! You've got this! Come on! Let's move it!
translation.de: Komm schon, Eric! Los! -Komm. -Du schaffst das. Los!

translation.en: -[Tyler] You got this, Dylan. -[Gina] Good job, Tyler! Come on! Come on!
translation.de: -Du schaffst das, Dylan. -Gut gemacht, Tyler! Los!

translation.en: I got you.
-More training, less flirting! -Uh...
-Sick teamwork, bro. -Nice save, dog!
Oops! Sorry!
All you have to do is get across this line.
translation.de: Ihr müsst nur über die Linie treten.

translation.en: -That's it? -[Gina] Yep.
This feels like a trap.
If it's a trap, don't worry. I'll protect you. I can protect myself.
translation.de: -Keine Sorge. Ich beschütze dich. -Ich beschütze mich selbst.

translation.en: Guys, it's not a trap!
Then why am I holding a riot shield?
translation.de: Warum halte ich dann einen Schutzschild?

translation.en: Because it is a trap!
Everybody get behind me!
[Lizzie] Come on, Dylan! A couple of more steps! Come on!
Now push! We're almost there!
That's it! Great teamwork!
-[Dylan] God. -[Lizzie] Push! You got it!
Push!
I told you to be prepared for anything!
translation.de: Ihr solltet auf alles vorbereitet sein!

translation.en: You guys, help me with this thing!
translation.de: Leute, helft mir mit dem Ding!

translation.en: [Tyler] We gotta grab it! Okay.
[Dylan] I can't get it.
You guys distract it, and I'll sneak up behind it!
translation.de: Ihr lenkt es ab, ich schleiche mich an!

translation.en: You can't distract it! It's a hose, you moron!
translation.de: Einen Schlauch kann man nicht ablenken, Idiot!

translation.en: [Dylan] A little this way.
-[Lizzie] Hey! -[Tyler] A little closer.
[Dylan] I can't.
-Grab it! Somebody grab it! -[Gina] I got it! I got it!
translation.de: Jemand soll ihn sich packen! Ich habe ihn!

translation.en: Don't worry. I got it.
Hey, settle down, sunshine. This is a job for a big fella, not a little wallaby like you.
translation.de: Langsam, Sonnenschein. Das ist ein Job für große Kerle, kein kleines Wallaby.

translation.en: We did it!
Yes! We killed it!
Uh, guys?
Oy!
Everybody okay?
Yeah, we're just doing a little training.
Ah. Sorry.
Do you, uh, want me to turn it back on, do ya?
[all] No!
Look, we're kind of wrapping it up, anyway.
-You guys all right? -Depends. How much of that did you see?
translation.de: -Alles ok bei euch? -Kommt drauf an. Wie viel saht ihr?

translation.en: All of it, mate.
Well, then, we've been better. I'm Eric!
translation.de: Dann geht es uns so mittel. Ich bin Eric!

translation.en: Oh! I'm Kezza.
And that's Johnno, Shaz, Carli, and that's Wayno.
translation.de: Und das sind Johnno, Shaz, Carli und Wayno.

translation.en: So, you guys are the new Team USA?
translation.de: Ihr seid also das neue Team USA?

translation.en: Looks like we got some stiff competition, boys?
translation.de: Sieht nach einer harten Konkurrenz aus.

translation.en: Don't worry. We'll be ready by Friday.
Oh, of course you will be.
You guys are doing a ripper job out there, right, Wayno?
translation.de: Ihr macht einen Hammerjob, oder, Wayno?

translation.en: Yeah, sure.
Just messing with you, mate.
you forgot your wrench.
Yeah, it must have been cracked or something.
translation.de: Der hatte bestimmt schon Risse oder so.

translation.en: You guys are in trouble. Would you get out of here?
Oh, she's right. We are in trouble.
translation.de: Es stimmt. Wir sind in der Patsche.

translation.en: He's been going nonstop for three days. [chuckles] Oh, gosh. Eh!
translation.de: Er malt seit drei Tagen ununterbrochen. Meine Güte.

translation.en: Everyone stay on this side of his canvas.
translation.de: Alle bleiben auf dieser Seite seiner Leinwand.

translation.en: Do not interrupt him.
Come on! Pick it up!
Eric, what are you doing?
-Keeping you company. -You don't have to.
translation.de: -Was tust du? -Dir Gesellschaft leisten. Musst du nicht.

translation.en: I know. I want to.
Let's go!
Morning, brother.
Going for a little walkey-walkey, are we?
Wish I didn't see that.
translation.de: Das hätte ich lieber nicht gesehen.

translation.en: I can dig some holes where the other teams will be running.
translation.de: Ich kann Löcher auf dem Weg der anderen Teams graben.

translation.en: A few broken ankles would really even the odds.
translation.de: Einige Knöchelbrüche gleichen die Chancen aus.

translation.en: That's sweet, honey, but I think it'd be best if you just stayed out of the way.
translation.de: Das ist nett, aber halte dich lieber fern.

translation.en: Nobody will let me do anything.
Why do you keep making me come to Junior Rescue?
Oh, don't worry.
If things keep going the way they're going, there won't be a Junior Rescue to come back to.
translation.de: Wenn es so weitergeht, sind die Junior-Rettungsschwimmer bald weg.

translation.en: [woman shouts] Jeffy!
Where are you?
You seen my great big meatball sandwich?
translation.de: Hast du mein großes Sandwich gesehen?

translation.en: -[woman] Jeffy! -[record scratches, music stops]
Where are you?
[Gina] Listen up!
The trick with the cargo net is to move opposing limbs in unison
translation.de: Hier bewegt ihr Arme und Beine harmonisch

translation.en: and stick as close as you can to the support beams.
translation.de: und bleibt nah an den Stützbalken.

translation.en: Lizzie, you're up first. And try not to make me puke.
translation.de: Lizzie, du zuerst. Bring mich nicht zum Würgen.

translation.en: Come on, Lizzie, move it! Move it!
-[Lizzie grunts] -Uh, I-- I got you!
No, Eric! Let her do it!
-[grunts] I had it! -I know.
-Then why did you come up here? -I-- I just want to be here for you.
translation.de: -Warum bist du dann hier? -Ich will für dich da sein.

translation.en: Tyler, Dylan. Get in there and show 'em how it's done.
translation.de: Tyler, Dylan. Zeigt ihnen, wie's geht.

translation.en: -Like together? -We're not together.
-I know that. -What's going on with you two?
Nothing, let's just go.
[Lizzie] Ow! Oh! A lot of movement over there. Ow!
Okay! Okay!
That's Tyler's leg.
Who put this thing--
Ah! Getting a little light-headed!
This went wrong so fast.
translation.de: Das ging schnell in die Hose.

translation.en: [woman] Help!
Hey! Somebody needs our help!
-[woman] Help! -[man] Hey!
-[man] Come on! -[woman] Hey!
We're on it!
-Gina, a little help here? -We have to save them! Come on!
[Wayno] Aussies on this one.
Johnno and Carli, you take the one on the left!
translation.de: Johnno und Carli, nehmt den linken!

translation.en: [Kezza] All right, let's go. Now. Shaz and Johnno, in the water now.
translation.de: Ok, los. Sofort. Shaz und Johnno, ab ins Wasser.

translation.en: [Wayno] Let's go. Come on, team. You got it.
Watch out for the rips.
[Wayno] Let's go, team. Come on.
Hey! I said we're on it.
translation.de: Hey! Ich sagte, wir machen das.

translation.en: [Wayno] Let's go, team. Come on.
Let's go. You're doing' great. Bring 'em in.
translation.de: Ihr macht das toll. Bringt sie rein.

translation.en: Okay, bring 'em up. Come on.
[Tyler] Come on!
All right, yeah. That was amazing, Shaz. Good work.
translation.de: Das war beeindruckend, Shaz! Gute Arbeit.

translation.en: -Good stuff, team. -That was amazing.
Is everybody okay?
Oh, yeah. No worries, mate.
We just saw that youse were a bit busy with your net over there, so we jumped in.
translation.de: Ihr wart mit dem Netz beschäftigt, also sprangen wir ein.

translation.en: We didn't mean to show you up or nothing.
translation.de: -Wir wollten euch nicht bloßstellen. -Habt ihr nicht.

translation.en: -You didn't show us up. -Oh, you reckon, do ya?
translation.de: -Wir wollten euch nicht bloßstellen. -Habt ihr nicht. Meinst du?

translation.en: We're the ones who saved those shark biscuits
while you were flopping around like a mudskipper going walkabout.
I can't tell. Are you guys nice people, or are you not nice people?
translation.de: Ich weiß es einfach nicht. Seid ihr nett oder nicht nett?

translation.en: Yeah, I thought we kind of bonded over the whole "Brody's a drongo" thing.
translation.de: Ja, ich dachte, seit "Brody ist ein Honk" mögen wir uns.

translation.en: Yeah, look, that's when he was the drongo.
translation.de: Das war, als er der Honk war.

translation.en: Now you're the drongo, drongo.
translation.de: Jetzt bist du der Honk, Honk.

translation.en: I'm coming down on "not nice."
We came here... with one mission...
translation.de: Wir kamen mit einer Mission hierher:

translation.en: To destroy Team USA.
I just didn't think it was gonna be this easy, eh?
translation.de: Ich dachte nicht, dass es so leicht wird.

translation.en: Good bit of luck with the real team getting sick like that?
translation.de: Zum Glück wurde das echte Team krank.

translation.en: I know what the problem is.
translation.de: Ich weiß, was das Problem ist.

translation.en: I've been way too easy on you!
translation.de: Ich war zu nachsichtig mit euch!

translation.en: I wouldn't say that.
Tomorrow, I drop the hammer!
Don't worry. We'll get through this together.
translation.de: Keine Sorge. Wir schaffen es zusammen.

translation.en: Oh, what? 'Cause I can't do it by myself?
translation.de: Weil ich es nicht alleine schaffe?

translation.en: I didn't mean...
Man, none of this would be happening if Brody and his team hadn't gotten sick.
translation.de: Alles wäre anders, wenn Brody und sein Team nicht krank wären.

translation.en: Okay, well, they did, okay? I don't know why you're yelling at me about it!
translation.de: Sind sie aber. Warum schreist du mich deswegen an?

translation.en: I didn't mean...
What's wrong with Tyler?
How would I know? It's not like I sit around thinking about Tyler all the time!
translation.de: Was weiß ich? Als ob ich ständig an Tyler denken würde!

translation.en: My head's in the game! [grunts]
I didn't mean...
Actually, I don't know what I meant.
Ho! Excuse me.
I didn't realize there was anyone else in the building.
translation.de: Ich wusste nicht, dass noch jemand hier ist.

translation.en: I, too, do my best work after hours.
translation.de: Meine beste Arbeit liefere ich auch nach Feierabend.

translation.en: I'm in a band.
If you don't mind, I'll give you one of my CDs.
translation.de: Wenn es ok ist, gebe ich dir eine meiner CDs.

translation.en: You could listen to it,
maybe give me a little feedback, one artist to another.
translation.de: gib mir vielleicht Feedback, so unter uns Künstlern.

translation.en: I've got my, uh, e-mail on the back,
and my Twitter handle. Or you could just hit me up on LinkedIn.
translation.de: und mein Twitter-Name. Oder melde dich auf LinkedIn bei mir.

translation.en: I'd love to make you part of my network.
I'll just leave this here.
I really like that guy.
Quiet, good listener.
Right.
How ya doing, Gina?
If you're here to trash-talk my team, don't. I'm not in the mood.
translation.de: Mach bloß mein Team nicht runter. Keine Lust drauf.

translation.en: Oh, no, I'm not here to trash-talk your team. We're all Junior Rescue. We gotta stick together.
translation.de: Das will ich gar nicht. Wir Rettungsschwimmer halten zusammen.

translation.en: It doesn't matter where we come from.
I'm actually here to give you a little pep talk.
And why would you do that?
translation.de: Und warum willst du das tun?

translation.en: Um, because if you go into competition as bad as you are,
translation.de: Wenn ihr so schlecht in den Wettbewerb geht,

translation.en: we're gonna look like huge jerks when we kick your bums.
translation.de: sehen wir mies aus, wenn wir euch fertigmachen.

translation.en: People will be like, "Oh, why'd you humiliate those Yanks?"
We'll be like, "We didn't mean to. It's not our fault they're incompetent."
translation.de: Und wir so: "Keine Absicht. Die sind halt unfähig."

translation.en: They'll be like, "Too right. They're a bunch of bogans."
And I'll be like, "Hey, hey, hey. Lay off 'em, cause those bogans are our mates."
translation.de: Und ich: "Hey. Lasst sie in Ruhe, die Luschen sind unsere Kumpels."

translation.en: We've just had a couple off days. We're gonna win this thing.
translation.de: Wir hatten nur ein paar blöde Tage. Wir gewinnen.

translation.en: Oh, yes. See, look, that's the spirit.
And don't even worry about the fact that you're representing your entire country
translation.de: Mach dir keine Sorge, dass ihr das ganze Land vertretet

translation.en: or that tomorrow you're gonna completely humiliate yourself
translation.de: und euch vor der ganzen Welt total blamieren werdet.

translation.en: -in front of the world. -You're trying to get in my head.
translation.de: und euch vor der ganzen Welt total blamieren werdet. -Du versuchst, mich nervös zu machen. -Nein, nicht versuchen.

translation.en: Oh, no, I'm not trying to get in your head. [laughs]
translation.de: -Du versuchst, mich nervös zu machen. -Nein, nicht versuchen.

translation.en: I'm already in there.
And you? [laughs] You don't stand a chance.
translation.de: Und ihr? Ihr habt keine Chance.

translation.en: Catch you later.
Is it me, or is she even scarier when she's not yelling?
translation.de: Sie ist gruseliger, wenn sie nicht schreit.

translation.en: She's "Mom mad." That's the maddest you can be.
translation.de: Sie hat "Mom-Wut". Wütender geht es nicht.

translation.en: Do you want to lose tomorrow?
Speaking for me and Lizzie?
-No. -Eric, I can speak for myself.
-No. -'Cause it feels like you wanna lose.
I've been racking my brain trying to figure out
how you could possibly be this bad,
and all I could come up with is that you hate Junior Rescue.
translation.de: Sicher, weil ihr die Rettungsschwimmer hasst.

translation.en: Well, you need to reexamine your conclusions, because we love Junior Rescue.
translation.de: Dann überleg noch mal. Wir lieben die Rettungsschwimmer.

translation.en: Well, you're not training like you love it.
You're training like a bunch of bogans.
What's a bogan?
It's what you're training like!
You're distracted, and your teamwork sucks.
translation.de: Ihr seid abgelenkt. Das Teamwork ist mies.

translation.en: We've got one more day to get ready.
But you have to want it.
All of you. Do you want to win?
Of course we do. Then what's the problem?
They're way better than us.
translation.de: Sie sind viel besser als wir.

translation.en: You're trying to steal our secrets, are ya?
I mean, you can if you want.
You still don't have a prayer. Ha ha!
You see that? That thing I just did.
That was sweet as, right?
Let's see what you got, Team Drongo.
translation.de: Zeigt, was ihr könnt, Team Honk.

translation.en: -That was awesome, mate. So sick. -That was good, right?
[sighs] Four days isn't enough time. I thought I could get us ready, but I was wrong.
translation.de: Vier Tage reichen nicht. Ich dachte, ich schaffe es, aber es geht nicht.

translation.en: I'm sorry I let you down.
No, we let you down.
Yeah. We could have trained harder.
translation.de: Ja. Wir hätten härter trainieren können.

translation.en: I mean, every time I try to sit, I go, "Ow."
I think I could've given a little more.
Gina, we weren't even supposed to be doing this.
translation.de: Gina, wir waren nicht dafür vorgesehen.

translation.en: If Brody and the guys hadn't got sick--
Okay, fine! It's my fault! Is that what you wanted me to say?
translation.de: Ok, gut! Es ist meine Schuld! Wolltet ihr das hören?

translation.en: Dude, what did you do?
Brody was strutting around at the barbecue bragging that he was Team USA,
translation.de: Brody gab beim Grillen an, dass er Team USA war und wir nicht.

translation.en: and we weren't. So I pulled a prank on him.
translation.de: Brody gab beim Grillen an, dass er Team USA war und wir nicht. Ich spielte ihm einen Streich. Ich gab ihm den vergammelten Krautsalat.

translation.en: I gave him that rotten coleslaw.
translation.de: Ich spielte ihm einen Streich. Ich gab ihm den vergammelten Krautsalat.

translation.en: Tyler, why would you do that?
translation.de: Tyler, warum hast du das getan?

translation.en: I didn't know everybody else was gonna eat it. And I definitely didn't know they were gonna get sick.
translation.de: Ich ahnte nicht, dass alle ihn essen. Und dass alle krank werden.

translation.en: That coleslaw was 17 years old, man.
What'd you think was gonna happen?
I wasn't thinking, okay?
This whole year I was so excited to come back to Junior Rescue.
translation.de: Ich freute mich das ganze Jahr auf die Rettungsschwimmer.

translation.en: Now there might not even be a Junior Rescue.
Because of me.
Where do you think you're going, soldier? Hey, you get back here!
translation.de: Wo willst du hin, Soldat? Hey, komm zurück!

translation.en: That's an order!
[sighs] Can you believe him?
I bet we would have had a shot at this thing if the Aussies hadn't gotten in our heads.
translation.de: Wir hätten eine Chance, wenn die Australier uns nicht nerven würden.

translation.en: I wish they would get food poisoning.
I don't actually mean that. I'm just having a lot of feelings now.
translation.de: War nicht so gemeint. Ich habe gerade viele Gefühle.

translation.en: Give it a rest, kid.
[woman] Jeffy! You seen my radio?
translation.de: Jeffy! Hast du mein Radio gesehen?

translation.en: -[music clicks off] -[woman] Jeffy!
Hey! Get back here! What are you-- Ow! Ow!
translation.de: Hey! Komm zurück! Was machst du...

translation.en: God! Stubbed my big toe on this giant heart made out of rocks!
translation.de: Gott! Ich habe mir den Zeh an dem riesigen Herz aus Steinen gestoßen!

translation.en: Jeffy, did you put this here?
Is this you?
Hey, get back here! Jeffy!
[Brody] Mom!
I'm all out of juice!
Ma-- Hey, you're not my mom!
translation.de: Mom... Hey, du bist nicht meine Mom!

translation.en: What are you doing in my room?
Just wanted to stop by, see how you're doing.
translation.de: Ich wollte nur sehen, wie es dir geht.

translation.en: My tummy's still a little bit rumbly, but... I guess I feel a bit better.
translation.de: Mein Bauch grummelt noch etwas, aber ich fühle mich besser.

translation.en: Well, that's great. That's great news.
You and the team can still get out and win this thing. Come on, man.
translation.de: Du und das Team könnt noch gewinnen. Los.

translation.en: What are you, crazy?
translation.de: Spinnst du? Ich esse seit vier Tagen nichts Festes.

translation.en: I haven't eaten solid food in four days. I can't stand up without getting dizzy,
translation.de: Spinnst du? Ich esse seit vier Tagen nichts Festes. Beim Stehen wird mir schwindelig,

translation.en: and my doctor says I have the butthole of a 65-year-old man!
translation.de: und laut Arzt habe ich ein Poloch wie ein 65-Jähriger!

translation.en: Look, there's something I gotta tell you.
I knew that coleslaw was expired. But for the record, you were supposed to spit it out.
translation.de: Ich wusste, dass der Krautsalat alt war. Aber du solltest ihn ausspucken.

translation.en: This is...
awesome. [laughs]
-You're not mad? -Oh, no, I'm furious.
translation.de: -Du bist nicht sauer? -Nein, ich bin wütend.

translation.en: I was supposed to make history this year.
This whole time, I have been thinking I let everyone down.
translation.de: Ich dachte, ich hätte alle enttäuscht.

translation.en: But you let everyone down!
Trust me. I feel worse about it than you do. Oh, I guarantee you that is not true.
translation.de: -Ich fühle mich schlechter als du. -Das stimmt auf keinen Fall.

translation.en: You were right, man. I'm not Team USA material.
translation.de: Du hattest recht. Ich bin ungeeignet für Team USA.

translation.en: -Duh. -We can't do this. We can't win it.
Oh, boo-hoo-hoo! Look at me. I'm Tyler. I'm a big crybaby.
translation.de: Seht mich an. Ich bin Tyler. Ich bin eine Heulsuse.

translation.en: You wanna know why you're so annoying? Not really.
translation.de: -Willst du wissen, warum du so nervst? -Nein.

translation.en: It's because you never give up.
Oh, my God, it drives me crazy. It is by far your worst quality.
translation.de: Das macht mich irre. Es ist deine schlechteste Eigenschaft.

translation.en: -Uh, thanks? -So why are you giving up now?
The Beachmaster is tomorrow.
You screwed this up.
translation.de: Du hast es vermasselt. Bring es in Ordnung.

translation.en: You need to fix it. You should be out there kicking butt,
translation.de: Du hast es vermasselt. Bring es in Ordnung. Geh raus und zeig's ihnen. Stattdessen sitzt du hier und heulst.

translation.en: but you're in my bedroom crying like a giant wuss.
translation.de: Geh raus und zeig's ihnen. Stattdessen sitzt du hier und heulst.
